u.s: Thank you so much for coming.
How could I not have come?
When you called I rushed over because I couldn't believe... Are you okay, Emily?
Honestly, I worry more about Amir than myself.
I mean that was about the worst evening you could imagine -
Yes, the worst evening for you.
That bastard beat your face into pieces!
But that was not Amir who beat me.
Not the Amir I know.
It was like he was overtaken by this devil who has been living inside him.
The violence was inevitable, it was just bound to happen...
What?
What do you mean it was bound to happen?
There's something I haven't told you.

p.stage: Maya looks at Emily. She (Maya) looks worried and serious.

u.s: I slept with Isaac in London.
And I... I ruined his career.
(stuttering) You... you what?
Yes, I slept with Isaac, and I fucking regret it, but I am over it.
And because it isn't bad enough, I convinced Amir to help some Imam in court and he lost his job.
I basically destroyed his entire life in the course of a few months and I...
I wish I could take it back.

p.stage: Maya hugs Emily and starts consoling her

u.s: (soft) Everything will be okay.
I promise.
